title: How do I recover contacts from the SD card to the phoneï¼Ÿ
answer:
Use a file manager to open the root directory in the SD card. Touch the .vcf files and recover the contacts to Contacts.  
Touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111114162047.PNG) > Contacts > ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/1-111114162100.PNG)> Manage contacts > Restore from SD card. Select the .vcf files to be recovered and recover them to Contacts.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/2-111114162115.PNG)
